parameter-group.name: serialPortAdvanced
parameter-group.label: Manual Serial Port Settings
parameter-group.description: In case auto detection fails, it is possible to specify the Serial Port manually

parameter.name: serialPort
parameter.label: Serial Port
parameter.description: The Serial Port where the P1 port of the Smart Meter is connected (e.g. Linux: /dev/ttyUSB0, Windows: COM1)

parameter.name: receivedTimeout
parameter.label: Received Timeout
parameter.description: The time period within results are expected in seconds

parameter.name: enableAutoDetection
parameter.label: Enable Serial Port auto detection
parameter.description: In case auto detection of the DSMR-device does not work it is possible to disable auto detection and use the manual Serial port parameters.

parameter.name: baudrate
parameter.label: Serial Port baud rate
parameter.description: Specify the Serial Port baud rate.

parameter.name: databits
parameter.label: Serial Port data bits
parameter.description: Specify the Serial Port data bits.

parameter.name: stopbits
parameter.label: Serial Port stop bits
parameter.description: Specify the Serial Port stop bits.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh
parameter.description: The time interval the data is refreshed in seconds

parameter.name: channel
parameter.label: Channel
parameter.description: The DSMR-device channel for this meter (M-Bus channel). The binding will auto detect this value. In normal situations it is not necessary to adapt this value. If the auto detection failed or if physical changes are made to the meter setup (changed water, gas, heating) meters it can be necessary to update the M-Bus channel.
